<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get single pool by address from Astroport"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/astroport/pools/{address}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Currently supported on:
- terra2
- neutron
- injective


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"address","in":"path","description":"The pool address","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Status: 200","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"chainId":{"type":"string"},"poolAddress":{"type":"string"},"poolType":{"type":"string"},"dayVolumeUsd":{"type":"number"},"poolLiquidity":{"type":"number"},"poolLiquidityUsd":{"type":"number"},"poolStakedLiquidity":{"type":"number"},"poolStakedLiquidityUsd":{"type":"number"},"assets":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"address":{"type":"string"},"amount":{"type":"string","pattern":"^\\d+$"},"symbol":{"type":"string"},"price":{"type":"number"},"precision":{"type":"number"}},"required":["address","amount","symbol","price","precision"]}},"totalRewards":{"type":"object","properties":{"apr":{"type":"number"},"apy":{"type":"number"},"day":{"type":"number"}},"required":["apr","apy","day"]},"tradingFees":{"type":"object","properties":{"apr":{"type":"number"},"apy":{"type":"number"},"day":{"type":"number"}},"required":["apr","apy","day"]},"astroRewards":{"type":"object","properties":{"apr":{"type":"number"},"apy":{"type":"number"},"day":{"type":"number"}},"required":["apr","apy","day"]},"protocolRewards":{"type":"object","nullable":true,"properties":{"apr":{"type":"number"},"apy":{"type":"number"},"day":{"type":"number"}},"required":["apr","apy","day"]}},"required":["chainId","poolAddress","poolType","dayVolumeUsd","poolLiquidity","poolLiquidityUsd","poolStakedLiquidity","poolStakedLiquidityUsd","assets","totalRewards","tradingFees","astroRewards"]}}}}}}
